Description: Verify that the home page loads successfully.
Verify that the featured products section displays correctly.
Verify that the banner images load properly.
Verify that clicking on a product redirects to the product details page.
Verify that the navigation menu and footer links work correctly.
Verify that all products are displayed with images, names, and prices.
Verify that filters (price range, category, brand, etc.) work as expected.
Verify that sorting options (price low to high, high to low, newest, etc.) function correctly.
Verify pagination works if there are many products.
Verify that product details (name, price, description, images) load correctly.
Verify that selecting different variations (color, size, material) updates the price and availability.
Verify that the "Add to Cart" button functions correctly.
Verify that clicking the "Add to Wishlist" button functions correctly
Verify that users can view product reviews and ratings.
Verify that products can be added to the cart.
Verify that cart updates when items are removed or quantities are changed.
Verify that the total price updates correctly when adding/removing items.
Verify that the "Proceed to Checkout" button works.
Verify that products can be added to the wishist.
Verify that remove  products from  wishist functions well.
Verify that users can enter billing and shipping details.
Verify that payment methods work correctly.
Verify that an order confirmation email is sent after successful payment.
Verify that users can register successfully.
Verify that users can log in with valid credentials.
: Verify that users cannot log in with invalid credentials.
Verify that logged-in users can access their order history and profile.
Verify that admins can add, update, and delete products in Sanity CMS.
Verify that orders appear in the admin dashboard with the correct status.
Verify that admins can update the order status (Pending, Shipped, Delivered).
Verify that the website is fully responsive on mobile, tablet, and desktop.
Verify that images and pages load quickly and smoothly.
Verify that the website works properly on different browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge).
